name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove Entertainment Pieces from Daily Wire

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Removes most entertainment-related articles while browsing the Daily Wire home page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension removes most entertainment-related articles from the Daily Wire home page whenever you visit it.  You didn't come to DW for these piecesâ€”in fact, you may have come to get away from such articles.  With this extension you can.  Enjoy.  (Please note that the extension is not perfect, as it filters based on author.)

If you liked this and are feeling charitable, you can help me meet rent:  https://www.buymeacoffee.com/spejamas
